long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sonda is a lightweight extension, allowing you to find the latest listings within seconds of their appearance on your favorite classifieds.

Stay focused on what matters to you.
Instead of constant manual refreshing and prolonged waiting for a specific deal, let us do that for you! As soon as new deal appears we will notify you about it!

It's fast - retrieves listings in seconds after their appearance, using minimal resources.
It's easy - a simple to setup and use plug and play interface, rich in features.
It's reliable - we monitor and support to ensure everything runs smoothly.
